document_data.mainbody:
lda was a Night Blade who resided in the ruined Temple of Bhaal in the Undercity of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Elda was a red-headed and pale-skinned human woman armed with two daggers.
In the , during the Absolute crisis, Night Blade Elda killed by strangulation in service of Bhaal, the Lord of Murder and his Chosen â€“ Orin the Red. Thorough servitude to Orin, Elda supported the Cult of the Absolute that threatened the city of Baldurs Gate
